title: Patch Notes
content: Mirror. Attacking the Zhent inside the Zhentarim Hideout will now more consistently drag your entire party into the fight. Shoving someone down the pit to the Underdark in the Whispering Depths will award XP more often. Soldiers will now be Inspired if you defeat the goblins attacking the Emerald Grove if there are no losses on the tieflings' side. Fixed the crucible at the Adamantine Forge becoming uninteractable after Grym dies. The 'Acolytes of the Demonweb Pits' background goal will now trig
